nodes.bodyText: Please revert this change; it's preferable to not depend on CasProtocolConstants if possible.

Hi,
So, should I just default it like this ?
private String redirectParameter = "service"

If it is not defined, the second bug described in this PR will occurs. Or should I default it in the OidcLogoutEndpointController.java file ?
Regards,
Julien

The second option, where you default it much like the LogoutAction, as:
StringUtils.defaultIfEmpty(logoutProperties.getRedirectParameter(), CasProtocolConstants.PARAMETER_SERVICE);
On second thought using "service" as the default is perfectly fine too :)

Ok.
Will do it in a few hours. :)
